deleteAlert.title: Are you sure?
deleteAlert.desc: Evaluation will be permanenly removed from the history.

exceptions.title: Error has occured
exceptions.deleteEvaluation: Failed to delete the evaluation. Please try again.
exceptions.SmileNotDetected: Smile was not found. Please try again.
exceptions.VideoTooLong: Video was too long. Please try again.
exceptions.apiNotAvailable: Could not connect to the server. Please try again later.
exceptions.saveEvaluationFail: Failed to save the evaluation. Shown results will not be saved.
exceptions.saveEvaluationFailVideo: Failed to save evaluation's video. The evaluation will be shown without the video.
